description: Paddle across Aasee Lake and enjoy the refreshing breeze and scenic views.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing canoeing experience on Münster’s largest lake, surrounded by greenery and city views.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket at all times.
Be cautious of other boats and swimmers.

description: A scenic cycling trip to Hiltruper See, a tranquil lake perfect for a short break and picnic.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful cycling route leading to Hiltruper See, passing through forested areas and open landscapes.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and follow traffic rules.
Bring a bottle of water for hydration.
Be cautious when cycling on mixed-use paths.

activity: Picnic and Walk at Wienburg Park
description: Relax with a picnic and explore the serene walking trails at Wienburg Park.

locationInfo.description: A lush green park ideal for a peaceful picnic, followed by a scenic walk among nature trails.
safetyTips: Carry a picnic blanket and enough food and drinks.
Dispose of waste properly to keep the park clean.
Wear comfortable shoes for walking on uneven paths.

description: Experience horseback riding through the picturesque countryside near Roxel.

locationInfo.description: A guided horseback riding tour through meadows, forests, and open fields in the Roxel area.
safetyTips: Wear appropriate riding gear, including a helmet.
Follow the instructor’s guidance at all times.
Be gentle with the horses and respect their pace.

description: A nature walk through the Rieselfelder wetlands, home to diverse bird species and beautiful landscapes.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful escape into nature with birdwatching opportunities and scenic walking trails.
safetyTips: Stay on marked trails to protect wildlife.
Wear light, breathable clothing for warm weather.
